review: I really want to love this. Starting with the fact that my preorder came out way after the black Fridays one. The system is almost always out of sync, voice and pictures match up about 30% of the time. I have checked my setting and connection as fully as I can. I'm running gigabyte internet on a dual band 2.5 and 5 gigahertz, my WiFi is receiving on 2.5 at 100mbps and the 5 GHz ban at 650mbps. I know that the Fire Stick has AC connection, so I really hope its a softwares problem that can be fixted with an update. I also really wish that the apps didn't require two clicks to open. When I click Netflix and Hulu I don't want to be prompted to open the ap that I already clicked to open.
